content: Just wondering if anyone has done a mapping (or implementation) of the AuditEvent to the IHE ATNA profile?
I thought th mapping was in the resource
(I hadn't looked there) Its not in there. But is for w3c prov, and also one for mapping to/from FHIR AuditEvents and Provenance.
@John Moehrke ? Do you know of anyone?
Actually, it is there, but you've been fooled by the name
the DICOM mapping is actually the ATNA mapping
Thanks, I guess there's an issue to be logged there too.
The standard is dicom. Atna is a profile from ihe.
